metadata.title: CVE-2024-53137 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ARM: fix cacheflush with PANIt seems that the cacheflush syscall got broken when PAN for LPAE wasimplemented. User access was not enabled around the cache maintenanceinstructions, causing them to fault.
